title.rendered: PAIGE + JON MARK’S MODERN, NATURAL WEDDING

content.rendered:
Looking back on our wonderful couples and the cherished memories we've made with them is the cherry on top of our job sundae.

One such couple's journey continues while their modern wedding with natural touches at The Bridge Building has stood the test of time.

Planned in 2014 by Jessica Sloane and featured on Green Wedding Shoes and MODwedding, Paige and Jon Mark wanted their day to be relaxed and a true reflection of who they are as a couple.

Inspired by a single image of a cactus, they decided on muted dusty hues with gold accents for a warm, organic feel to complement The Bridge Building's modern vibe.

Since Paige is a designer and art director, she designed their invitations and created a custom logo for the day to keep it cohesive and chic.

She and the girls carried airy, textured bouquets tied with long silk ribbon by Vintage Florals. With delicate flower crowns for Paige and her flower girl too.

Beginning with a rooftop ceremony, there wasn't a dry eye in sight as guests listened to the couple exchange their vows.

For the reception in the Cumberland space, towering centerpieces, olive sprigs, and single bright, blooms in gold-dipped glass bottles were scattered throughout. While sweet, printed cards sat at each place setting to welcome and thank guests for coming. As a treat, they were given coffee beans from Kaldi's Coffee as take-homes.

Later on the rooftop, they danced to "If I Needed You" by Andrew Bird, sung live as a duet by a close family member and friend of Paige's.

And one of our favorite details of the day? A cake topper hand-carved by Paige's grandfather, depicting the couple and their sweet pup. It sat on one of their TEN incredible cakes from Dessert Designs by Leland.

We can't wait to see what the next five years and beyond will bring for Paige and Jon Mark! Keep scrolling for more from their modern natural wedding, beautifully captured by Taylor Lord.

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: March 8, 2014
Bride & Groom: Paige and Jon
Location: The Bridge Building
Colors: Rose, Tangerine, & Gold
Photographer: Taylor Lord
Videographer: Anchor Heart Films
Paper Goods: Paige Foley Design & Bella Figura
Calligraphy: Mon Voir
Florist: Vintage Florals
Cakes: Dessert Designs by Leland
Favors: Kaldi's Coffee
Band: Party of 5
Linens & Chairs: Liberty Party Rental
Catering & Bar: The Bridge Building
Production Design: Infinity Hospitality
Planning: Jessica Sloane

excerpt.rendered: Looking back on Paige + Jon’s modern, natural wedding with Jessica Sloane at The Bridge Building.
